thread.section_title: Ding Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ding | www.ding.com
thread.title: Charles K

author: Charles K
title: Charles K
text: Ding is a fantastic application for remotely sending mobile credit to family members and friends worldwide and even locally if emergency credit is needed on pay as you go or top up credit sim cards. There is a small fee of course but it is very reasonable. They also accept all major debit and credit cards and also PayPal which is awesome. I find Ding supports all the main mobile networks in every country. Highly recommended and I rate it 5 out of 5 stars.
